name: FlumeWater
0:
”Alexa, ask Flume for my water use yesterday”
”Alexa, ask Flume for my current water status”
”Alexa, ask Flume about my weekly water budget”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flume
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa skill for the Flume Smart Home Water Monitoring System with WiFi. Water Leak Detector & Water Usage Monitor - 5 Minute Install, No Tools Required - Live Phone Notifications. 

Use this Alexa skill to access data from the Flume systems with your voice. Ask about current water status, water use during a given timeframe, or check you water budgets.
